channel.title: Indigoo - Remix Megamix! [Idea, WIP]
channel.description: So I was thinking today, and I had an idea: The Remix Mega Mix! Essentially what this is is I make a ton of short (1 - 2 minute) remixes of songs, and compile them together to create a giant 8 minute long track! (Or something like that) Obviously, I can’t make this giant track using just Auxy, so I will be using Djay to compile the tracks. I made this topic for people to share their opinion on this idea, give some feedback, or maybe if I can’t find enough tracks to remix, submit some to be in this. Thanks guys! -Indigoo

item.title: Indigoo - Remix Megamix! [Idea, WIP]
item.dc:creator: Indigoo
item.description:
So I was thinking today, and I had an idea:
The Remix Mega Mix!
Essentially what this is is I make a ton of short (1 - 2 minute) remixes of songs, and compile them together to create a giant 8 minute long track! (Or something like that)
Obviously, I can’t make this giant track using just Auxy, so I will be using Djay to compile the tracks.
I made this topic for people to share their opinion on this idea, give some feedback, or maybe if I can’t find enough tracks to remix, submit some to be in this.
Thanks guys!
-Indigoo
